GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of defined article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of defined article

exampleResponse.body: Replacing the quiet elegance of the dark suit and tie with the casual indifference of these muted earth tones is a form of fashion suicide, but, uh, call me crazy â€” onyou it works.
exampleResponse.name: sam

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the defined article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from the defined article
